object.content:
new note !

# how to convince someone to not use AI art for event promotion

----------

I was asked the question:

"how do I convince someone that we shouldn't use AI art to create promotion posters for our local event?"

I wanted something a bit more "evidenced" than "AI is for losers" (my usual response), so the below is compiled from that search.

…

https://blog.alifeee.co.uk/notes/how-to-convince-someone-to-not-use-ai-art-for-event-promotion/

object.content:
what do you do to listen to music?

mainly at the moment I listen to BBC Radio 6 Music. I cancelled my Spotify a year or so ago.

other options I can see include

stream
- Spotify
- YouTube Music
- soundcloud
- https://www.deezer.com/en/
- https://tidal.com/
- https://stream.resonate.coop/search?q=girli
- https://www.qobuz.com/gb-en/discover

purchase
- https://bandcamp.com/
- buy CDs and rip to audio file?

self-host
- https://www.navidrome.org/
- https://www.funkwhale.audio/

playlist transfer tools
- https://soundiiz.com/
